name: Engine
description: The heart of the car that powers it.

name: Transmission
description: Responsible for changing gears and transmitting power.

name: Brake System
description: Responsible for slowing down and stopping the car.

name: Headlights
description: Front lights for illumination during low light conditions.

name: Battery
description: Provides electrical power to start the car and run accessories.

name: Tires
description: Rubber components that provide traction and support the vehicle.

name: Suspension System
description: Maintains vehicle stability and handling.

name: Exhaust System
description: Removes and filters exhaust gases from the engine.

name: Radiator
description: Cools the engine to prevent overheating.

name: Alternator
description: Generates electrical power for the car's electrical systems.

name: Air Conditioning Compressor
description: Provides cool air for the cabin.

name: Steering Wheel
description: Controls the direction of the vehicle.

name: Catalytic Converter
description: Reduces harmful emissions from the exhaust.

name: Fuel Pump
description: Transfers fuel from the tank to the engine.

name: Spark Plugs
description: Ignites the fuel-air mixture in the engine cylinders.

name: Wiper Blades
description: Clears rain and debris from the windshield.

name: Shock Absorbers
description: Absorb and dampen shocks from the road.

name: Thermostat
description: Regulates the engine's operating temperature.

name: Oxygen Sensor
description: Monitors the oxygen content in the exhaust gases.

name: Brake Pads
description: Friction material that applies pressure to the brake rotors.

name: Rearview Mirror
description: Provides a view of the rear of the vehicle.

name: Fuel Filter
description: Filters impurities from the fuel before reaching the engine.

name: Wheel Bearings
description: Supports the wheel hub and allows for smooth rotation.

name: Ignition Coil
description: Generates high voltage for the spark plugs.

name: A/C Condenser
description: Removes heat from the air conditioning refrigerant.

name: Power Steering Pump
description: Assists with steering by pressurizing power steering fluid.

name: Tail Lights
description: Rear lights for signaling and visibility.

name: Drive Belt
description: Transmits power from the engine to various components.

name: Air Filter
description: Filters air entering the engine for combustion.

name: CV Joints
description: Connects the transmission to the wheel axles.

name: Cruise Control Module
description: Maintains a constant speed set by the driver.

name: Fuel Tank
description: Stores and supplies fuel to the engine.

name: Radiator Fan
description: Cools the radiator by circulating air.

name: Starter Motor
description: Engages the engine to start the car.

name: Clutch Kit
description: Engages and disengages the engine from the transmission.

name: Ball Joints
description: Connects the control arms to the steering knuckles.

name: Axle Shafts
description: Transmits power from the differential to the wheels.

name: Ignition Switch
description: Turns the electrical system on and off.

name: Hood
description: Covers the engine compartment.

name: Exhaust Manifold
description: Collects exhaust gases from the engine cylinders.

name: Drive Shaft
description: Transmits power from the transmission to the differential.

name: Brake Calipers
description: Applies pressure to the brake pads to stop the car.

name: Fuel Pressure Regulator
description: Controls the fuel pressure in the fuel system.

name: Serpentine Belt
description: Drives multiple engine accessories.

name: Windshield
description: Provides a view of the road ahead.

name: EGR Valve
description: Recirculates exhaust gas to reduce emissions.

name: Ignition Control Module
description: Controls ignition timing and spark.

name: Shock Mounts
description: Attaches shock absorbers to the vehicle frame.

name: Intake Manifold
description: Distributes air to the engine cylinders.

name: Window Regulator
description: Raises and lowers the window glass.
